fields.title: Portfolio SPA Project
fields.description: This project is a Single Page Application portfolio consisting of a React frontend and a Django backend, containerized with Docker.

fields.title: DemoWallet
fields.description: DemoWallet is a modern MVP for a digital wallet and payment system, built with Django 5, Django REST Framework, and PostgreSQL. It supports user registration, KYC, P2P transfers, merchant payments, transaction ledger, and dispute management.
